attributes.action: More police down Waverly and West street to prevent violence
attributes.background:
Increasingly, there are a number of anti-social attacks on innocent people due to the abuse of alcohol and drugs. People's safety are at risk particularly on Friday's and Saturday's past 1am. 
Persisten violent attacks give Southport a very bad reputation. More preventative measures are needed.

rejection.details:
The policing of Waverly and West Street is the responsibility of Merseyside Police, not the UK Government or Parliament. You can contact Merseyside Police about your concerns on the link below:

https://www.merseyside.police.uk/contact-us/

If you like, you could start a new petition asking Government to fund more police  on the streets of the UK.
